name: The Prognosticator - a playbook for Wanderhome
name_original: The Prognosticator - a playbook for Wanderhome
description:
The Prognosticator is a playbook for the fantastic Wanderhome tabletop role-playing game. Wanderhome is a game about stories of the past meeting the search for the future.  The Prognosticator playbook explores our wanting certainty about predicting our futures, and the Almanacks which can guide our growth.

You bring the future into reach, gathering the paths of the stars to tell Farmers, Physickers, and Far-travelers what the year will bring.  The Almanacke you write for tells each year of strange events of the year past, and strange events of the year to come.

You are alive. Your care is creative, observant, and sometimes accurate.

Wanderhome is copyright of Possum Creek Games Inc.

The Prognosticator Playbook  is an independent production by Andrew Aulenback and Eric Drew and is not affiliated with Possum Creek Games Inc. It is published under the Wanderhome Third Party License.

Made possible by the generous Wanderhome Third Party License.
